definition: handsome/refined/elegant/graceful/superior/show (loanword)/CL:場|场[chang2]/(literary) to grow/to bloom/(of crops) to produce ears

sentences.english: This is Junsu, you met him before, remember?
sentences.chinese: 这位是金俊秀，你们之前见过，记得吧？

sentences.english: A handsome summer in Hainan with blue water and sweet coconut.
sentences.chinese: 一位俊秀的夏天在海南有蓝色的水和甜椰子。

sentences.english: In truth, fair Montague, I am too fond.
sentences.chinese: 俊秀的蒙塔古啊，我真的太痴心了。

sentences.english: It is a very outstanding country with many mountains.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个多山的俊秀国度。

sentences.english: The brief and fashion design is little and exquisite, shedding elegant and pretty temperament.
sentences.chinese: 简约而时尚的设计，小巧精致，飘逸出俊秀的气质。

sentences.english: JYJ member Xiah combination of luxury becomes a topic.
sentences.chinese: 组合JYJ成员细亚俊秀的豪宅成为话题。

sentences.english: Clear, beautiful and healthy looking eyes.

definition: lucid and elegant/quiet and exquisite/clear and attractive style
variant of 氣宇軒昂|气宇轩昂[qi4 yu3 xuan1 ang2]
to have an imposing or impressive appearance/impressive appearance/straight and impressive looking
